description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物、第十三届全国人民代表大会湖北省代表。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and a delegate from Hubei Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省下辖的县级市。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Hubei Province, People's Republic of China.
The majority ethnic group in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The 13th highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的组成人员，是最高国家权力机关的组成人员。
description.en: Members of the National People's Congress, who are components of the highest state authority.

description.zh-cn: 程梦醒的籍贯是湖北应城。
description.en: Cheng Mengxing's ancestral home is Yingcheng, Hubei.
Cheng Mengxing is of Han ethnicity.

description.zh-cn: 程梦醒是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Cheng Mengxing is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，程梦醒被选为湖北省出席第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: In 2018, Cheng Mengxing was elected as a delegate from Hubei Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 程梦醒担任第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: Cheng Mengxing serves as a delegate to the 13th National People's Congress.
